title: Creative Team
about: The Creative Team members are responsible for assisting the Creative Head in managing the design and creative aspects of all council events and initiatives.
responsibilities: The Creative Team members will be responsible for assisting the Creative Head in managing the design and creative aspects of all events and initiatives.
They will help with tasks such as creating promotional materials, designing posters, and managing social media content.
skills: Good design and creative abilities, as well as good communication and organizational skills, are essential for this role.
perks: The Creative Team members will gain valuable experience in design and creative management.
They will also receive a letter of appreciation at the end of their tenure.
